excerpt: Enjoy these delicious vegan chocolate chip cookies that are easy to make and perfect for satisfying your sweet cravings!

instructions.name: Preheat oven and prepare baking sheet
instructions: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

instructions.name: Mix dry ingredients
instructions: In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.

instructions.name: Beat wet ingredients
instructions: In a large mixing bowl, beat together the vegan butter, brown sugar, and white sugar until creamy and fluffy.
Add in the soy milk and vanilla extract and mix well.

instructions.name: Combine and chill dough
instructions: Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix until well combined.
Chill the cookie dough in the refrigerator for at least 15 minutes.

instructions.name: Bake cookies
instructions: Scoop 1 tablespoon of the dough and roll into a ball.
Place the balls onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing them about 2 inches apart.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes or until golden brown around the edges.
Let cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack.
Enjoy your delicious vegan chocolate chip cookies!
